data.what_is:
AIQUA is a user engagement platform that helps you leverage AI to proactively engage end users in the most effective way across all marketing channels.

1) Omnichannel Engagement:

Reach your customers through a comprehensive range of communication channels all managed from one platform. An easy-to-use interface enables you to customize your user experience on both their app and website across each of the user's devices. Your customer communications can be further optimized to target additional channels, including push notifications, email, SMS, and messenger programs.

2) AI-based Recommendation:

Achieve hyper-personalization and deliver 1:1 recommendations with Appier's deep content-based NLP and user-based AI solutions. Optimize not only performance (CTR, CVR), but also user experience (product coverage, diversity, novelty, etc.). You can set different goals by implementing hybrid strategies to adapt to the fast-changing world.

3) Customer Journey Automation:

Engage your customers with real-time notifications triggered by their behavior along their user journey. Simply drag-and-drop to easily bridge gaps among key actions for conversion, and to orchestrate multiple channels and campaigns with AIQUA's unique AI-driven Journey Map feature.

4) A/B and Multivariate Testing:

Measure true performance uplifts and ROI by flexibly experimenting with multiple variants to identify the best creative or factor. Set up a control group to see whether your marketing campaigns are effective and check which variant performs the best with visualized analytics.

5) Custom Algorithms and Scenarios:

Combine your industry know-how with our AI capabilities. On top of our standard platform, Appier provides custom services to design algorithms and scenarios that cater to your business goals. Import customized factors, algorithms and campaigns to the platform and see how they perform with our analytics.

6) Audience Segmentation:

Define your target audience easily with various user conditions, including user behavior, CRM, external interests, etc. Import predictive segments from AIXON to make forward-looking decisions, such as predicting users who are likely to purchase or churn in the future.

7) Rich Creatives:

Explore a wide range of creative formats for you to use across channels. Experiment with carousels, videos, GIFs and more to deliver personalized images and text with dynamic creatives based on conditions that cater to your marketing scenarios.
data.product_description: The AIQUA customer engagement platform leverages AI to help marketers better understand their audience's specific needs. AIQUA identifies each customer's unique interests both inside and outside of your app or website. Marketers can precisely segment audiences based on what they need and want; map users across multiple devices to identify via which screen and channel to reach them; develop the most effective campaigns across the most engaging channels and formats; and easily track results and metrics to identify any necessary tweaks or shifts. AIQUA integrates into your marketing operations in one day or fewer and is designed to be intuitive and easy to use.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file. 12 reviewers of Appier AIQUA have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: As reported in 12 Appier AIQUA reviews. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product. This feature was mentioned in 11 Appier AIQUA reviews.

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: As reported in 10 Appier AIQUA reviews. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

initial_reviews.review_title: Easy to use for efficient marketing automation, and best support team ever
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Appier AIQUA?
What I love about the software is that they offer more than just tools--they really partner with you. Their tech and business support team are always ready to tap in with personalized advice. Also the service helps integration smoother than expected. Plus, the platform is user-friendly, making it easy to get started without a steep learning curve. The combination has made a huge difference in achieving our goals and business effectively.

What do you dislike about Appier AIQUA?
While Appier AIQUA has many strengths, one area that could be improved is the complexity of some advanced/beta features. Sometimes it can be a bit overwhelming requiring to be solved by support team's guidance.

What problems is Appier AIQUA solving and how is that benefiting you?
In my role as a marketing consultant within the to C entertainment software industry, AIQUA has been a helpful tool. It effectively manages the overwhelming data, allowing me to extract valuable owned media campaign insights crucial for crafting targeted marketing strategies. AIQUA's AI-driven capabilities enable me to create personalized and dynamic experiences for users, driving engagement and loyalty. Its add-on predictive audience module optimize campaign performance, while cross-channel communication ensures less labor efforts. Additionally, AIQUA automates repetitive tasks, freeing up time for strategic planning and creativity. Overall, AIQUA empowers me to deliver better results and progressing over time.

initial_reviews.review_title: Collect users' website behavior and quickly reach out to users for contact
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Appier AIQUA?
1. Collect users' website behavior and quickly reach out to users for contact
2. By connecting with other solutions, import the list and make contacts
3. Can contact users through many different methods, such as APP PUSH, LINE PUSH, SMS... different methods
4. Design different marketing reach plans for different channels and track them

What do you dislike about Appier AIQUA?
1. There are more options for calculating attribution, such as adding UTM attribution and adding date and number options. will be more objective.
2. The default performance tracking should be set to not double-calculate the results, which will be more objective.
3. If there are other solutions such as AIRIS connected in series, it is recommended that the definitions of events, behaviors, etc. should be consistent. Otherwise, if they are used interchangeably in different solutions, different definition names will need to be readjusted.

What problems is Appier AIQUA solving and how is that benefiting you?
Quickly collect users' browsing behavior on the website, and quickly reach users through functions to communicate with users more effectively and improve conversions.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Appier AIQUA?
Appier AIQUA's platform has very intuitive user interface, making it easy to integrate with its AI-related features. However, what truly sets Appier apart is its exceptional customer support team. Their hands-on approach has been extremely helpful, greatly maximizing the value of their product for us.

What do you dislike about Appier AIQUA?
Having utilized Appier AIQUA for nearly a year, I've generally been impressed with its performance. However, the integration and synergy between AIQUA and other Appier products, such as AIRIS and Botbonnie, have room for improvement. While each product operates effectively in isolation, the seamless interaction and data exchange between them aren't as fluid or intuitive as one might expect.

What problems is Appier AIQUA solving and how is that benefiting you?
Appier AIQUA primarily addresses two challenges for us: the tedious process of setting up campaigns across different channels, and the difficulty of implementing an AI model for personalization on our ecommerce website. These challenges are overcome through its marketing automation and product recommendation features. The impact of these features has significantly improved the performance of our Double 11 campaign.
